2.verse: Makandange ngokwanga komlomo wakhe; Ngokuba izincokoliso zakho zimnandi ngaphezu kwewayini.

3.verse: Amafutha akho anevumba elimnandi; Liyioli ethululwayo igama lakho; Ngenxa yoko iintombi ziyakuthanda.

4.verse: Nditsale, sogidima emva kwakho; Ukuba ukumkani undingenise ezingontsini zakhe, Sogcoba, sivuye ngawe. Sozikhankanya izincokoliso zakho ngaphezu kwewayini; Zikuthanda zinyanisile.

5.verse: Ndimnyama, ndinomkhitha noko, Zintombi zaseYerusalem,  Njengeentente zakwaKedare, Njengamalengalenga kaSolomon.

6.verse: Musani ukundikhangela ngakuba ndife mnyama, Ngakuba nditshe lilanga. Oonyana bakama bandivuthela ngomsindo, Bandenza umlindi wezidiliya; Ke esisesam isidiliya andisilindanga.

7.verse: Khawundixilele, wena uthandwa ngumphefumlo wam, Walusela phi na? Uyibuthisa phi na imihlambi emini enkulu? Ngokuba kungani na ukuba ndibe njengogqubutheleyo Ngasemihlambini yamakholwane akho?

8.verse: Ukuba akwazi, nzwakazindini phakathi kweentokazi, Phuma,  uhambe ngemikhondo yomhlambi, Uwaluse amatakane akho ngaseminqubeni yabalusi.

10.verse: Zinomkhitha izidlele zakho ziingcaca, Umqala wakho zizidanga.

12.verse: Xa ukumkani asesetafileni yakhe, Inadusi yam isuka ilikhuphe ivumba layo.

13.verse: Sisiqhuma semore intanda yam kum, Esihleli phakathi kwamabele am.

14.verse: Sisihloko sekofere intanda yam kum Ezidiliyeni zase-Engedi.

15.verse: Yabona, uyinzwakazi, wethu! Yabona, uyinzwakazi! Amehlo akho anjengawamavukuthu.

16.verse: Yabona, uyinzwakazi, ntanda yam; ewe, umnandi; Umandlalo wethu uluhlaza.

17.verse: Imiqadi yendlu yethu yimisedare, Iipanele zethu yimisipres.

2.verse: Njengenyibiba phakathi kweminga, Unjalo uwethu phakathi kweentombi.

3.verse: Njengomapile phakathi kwemithi yehlathi, Injalo intanda yam phakathi koonyana. Ndanqwena, ndahlala phantsi emthunzini wawo,  Nesiqhamo sawo sanencasa ekhuhlangubeni lam.

4.verse: Indingenise endlwini yewayini, Nebhanile yayo phezu kwam luthando.

5.verse: Ndixhaseni ngezicumba zeerasintyisi, Ndisekeleni ngeeapile;  ngokuba ndisifa luthando.

6.verse: Isandla sayo sokhohlo siphantsi kwentloko yam; Esokunene siyandiwola.

7.verse: Zintombi zaseYerusalem, ndinifungisa Amabhadikazi namaxhamakazi asendle, Ukuba ningaluvusi, ukuba ningaluvuseleli uthando, Lude luthande.

8.verse: Phulaphulani! Intanda yam, nantso isiza, Itsiba ezintabeni,  isuka imitsi ezindulini.

9.verse: Intanda yam ifana nebhadi, nenkonyana yexhama. Nantso imi emva kodonga lwakokwethu, Ithe nzo ngeefestile, Inyondla ngekroba.

10.verse: Intanda yam yasusela, yathi kum, Suk ume, wethu, nzwakazi yam, uze;

11.verse: Ngokuba uyabona, ubusika budlule, Imvula igqithile yemka;

12.verse: Iintyantyambo zibonakele ezweni; Ixesha lokuntyiloza kweentaka lifikile; Izwi lehobe ivakele ezweni lethu;

13.verse: Umkhiwane ukrwala amakhiwane awo, Imidiliya ityatyambile,  Itsho ngevumba elimnandi. Suk ume, wethu, nzwakazi yam, uze.

14.verse: Vukuthu lam elisemxawukeni wengxondorha, entsithelweni yemiba, Ndibonise ubuso bakho, ndivise ilizwi lakho; Ngokuba izwi lakho limnandi, ubuso bakho bunomkhitha.

15.verse: Sibambeleni iimpungutye, iimpungutye ezincinane ezonakalisa izidiliya; Izidiliya zethu zityatyambile.

16.verse: Intanda yam yeyam, mna ke ndingowayo Yalusela ezinyibibeni.

17.verse: Ide iphole imini, oluke amathunzi, Jika, ntanda yam,  uxelise ibhadi, uxelise inkonyana yexhama, Ezintabeni ezibugqagala.

1.verse: Esililini sam ebusuku ndamfuna lowo uthandwa ngumphefumlo wam; Ndamfuna andamfumana.

2.verse: Ndathi, Ndokha ndivuke, ndijikajike phakathi komzi,  Ezindaweni zembutho nasezitratweni; Ndiya kumfuna lowo uthandwa ngumphefumlo wam. Ndamfuna andamfumana.

3.verse: Abalindi abajikajika phakathi komzi bandifumana; Ndathi kubo, Khe nambona na lowo uthandwa ngumphefumlo wam?

4.verse: Ndithe ndisandula ukudlula kancinane kubo, Ndamlumana lowo uthandwayo ngumphefumlo wam; Ndambamba, andamyeka, Ndada ndamzisa endlwini kama, Engontsini yowandikhawulayo.

5.verse: Zintombi zaseYerusalem, ndinifungisa Amabhadikazi namaxhamakazi asendle, Ukuba ningaluvusi, ukuba ningaluvuseleli uthando, Lude luthande.

6.verse: Ngubani na lo, unyuka evela entlango njengemiqulu yomsi,  Eqhunyiselwa ngemore nentlaka emhlophe, Ithatyathwe emigutyeni yonke yomrhwebi?

7.verse: Yabona, sisingqengqelo sikaSolomon, Siphahlwe ngamagorha angamashumi amathandathu Kumagorha akwaSirayeli.

8.verse: Onke aphethe amakrele, afundiswe ukulwa, Lilelo linekrele ethangeni lalo Ngenxa yokoyika ebusuku.

9.verse: Ukumkani uSolomon uzenzele ithala Ngemithi yaseLebhanon.

10.verse: Iintsika zalo uzenze ngesilivere, Isayamo salo ngegolide,  umqamelo walo ngento emfusa, Umphakathi walo ubekelelwe ngothando, Luvela ezintombini zaseYerusalem.

11.verse: Phumani, zintombi zaseZiyon, nimkhangele ukumkani uSolomon,  Enesithsaba, awasinxitywa ngunina ngemini yokuzeka kwakhe,  Nangemini yokuvuya kwentliziyo yakhe.

1.verse: Yabona, uyinzwakazi, wethu; yabona, uyinzwakazi. Amehlo akho anjengawamavukuthu ngaphaya kwesigqubuthelo sakho; Iinwele zakho zinjengomhlambi weebhokhwe Osemathambekeni eentaba zaseGiliyadi.

2.verse: Amazinyo akho anjengomhlambi weegusha ezichetyiweyo,  Ezinyukayo zivela ekuhlanjweni, Zinamawele zonke, Kungekho ifelweyo kuzo.

3.verse: Unjengosinga olubomvu umlomo wakho; Ukuthetha kwakho kumnandi. Zinjengothanda lwerharnate iintlafuno zakho Ngaphaya kwesigqubuthelo sakho.

4.verse: Intamo yakho injengenqaba kaDavide, eyakhiwe ngokweendidi,  Ekuxhonywe kuyo iwaka leengweletshetshe, Onke amakhaka amagorha.

5.verse: Amabele akho omabini anjengamankonyana amabini angamawele ebhadi, Esidla phakathi kweenyibiba.

6.verse: Ide iphole imini, oluke amathunzi, Ndiya kuhamba ndiye entabeni yemore, Nasendulini yentlaka emhlophe.

7.verse: Uyinzwakazi kwaphela, wethu; Akukho siphako kuwe.

8.verse: Yiza sihle eLebhanon, mtshakazi, Yiza sihle eLebhanon; Ufike ubonisele encotsheni yeAmana, Encotsheni yeSenire neHermon,  Ezikhundleni zeengonyama, ezintabeni zezingwe.

9.verse: Uyingxwelerhile intliziyo yam, dade wethu, mtshakazi;  Uyingxwelerhile intliziyo yam ngomjezulo omnye, Ngamrhukane mnye wesambalo sakho.

10.verse: Azi kuhle ukuncokolisa kwakho, dade wethu mtshakazi! Azi kumnandi ukuncokolisa kwakho ngaphezu kwewayini, Nevumba lamafutha akho ngaphezu kobulawu buphelele!

11.verse: Umlomo wakho uvuza incindi, mtshakazi; Bubusi namasi ngaphantsi kolwimi lwakho. Ivumba leengubo zakho linjengevumba leLebhanon.

12.verse: Ngumyezo obiyelweyo udade wethu, umtshakazi; Ngumgogogo ovaliweyo, liliso lomthombo elitywiniweyo.

13.verse: Amahlumelo akho ngumyezo wemirharnate, kunye neziqhamo ezimnandi kakhulu, Ikofere kunye nenadusi;

14.verse: Inadusi nesafron, Ikalamo nesinamon, kunye nemithi yonke yentlaka emhlophe, Imore nehaloti, kunye nobulawu bonke obuyintloko.

15.verse: Uliliso lomthombo lasemiyezweni, Iqula lamanzi aphilileyo,  Nemiqukuqela yamanzi yaseLebhanon.

16.verse: Vuka, moya wasentla, uze nawe wasezantsi: Phephezela emyezweni wam, buqukuqele ubulawu bawo. Mayingene intanda yam emyezweni wayo, Idle isiqhamo esimnandi kakhulu.

1.verse: Ndingenile emyezweni wam, dade wethu, mtshakazi wam;  Ndiyikhile imore yam kunye netyeleba lam; Ndiyidlile intlango yam kunye nencindi yam; Ndiyisele iwayini yam kunye namasi am.  Yidlani bethu, Selani nibe mnandi, zintanda.

2.verse: Ndilele, yona intliziyo yam iphaphamile. Yiva, nantso intanda yam inkqonkqoza, isithi, Ndivulele, dade wethu, vukuthu lam, ngqibeleli yam, Ngokuba intloko yam izele ngumbethe,  Isihlwitha sam sizele ngamathontsi obusuku.

3.verse: Ndathi, Sendikhulule nengubo yam yangaphantsi; ndothini na ukubuya ndinxibe? Sendizihlambile iinyawo zam, ndothini na ukubuya ndizidyobhe?

4.verse: Intanda yam yasolula isandla sayo ngekroba; Kwasika esiswini ngenxa yayo.

5.verse: Ndavuka ndaya kuyivulela intanda yam, Nezandla zam zavuza imore; Neminwe yam, imore eyivuzelayo Esiphathweni sesitshixo.

6.verse: Ndayivulela mna intanda yam; Ke yona intanda yam ibijike yemka. Ndemkelwa ngumbilini yakuthetha; Ndayifuna,  andayifumana; Ndayibiza, ayasabela.

7.verse: Bandifumana abalindi abajikajika phakathi komzi, Bandibetha,  bandilimaza; Abalindi beendonga bandilulutha ingubo yam yokwaleka ekrelekrele.

8.verse: Ndiyanifungisa, zintombi zaseYerusalem, ukuba nithe nayifumana intanda yam, Into enoyixelela yona, nothi, ndiyafa luthando.

9.verse: Iyintoni na intanda yakho kunezinye iintanda, Wena nzwakazindini phakathi kweentokazi? Iyintoni na intanda yakho kunezinye, Ukuba wenjenje ukusifungisa?

10.verse: Intanda yam iqaqambile, iyingqombela, Iyeyongamileyo ngaphezu kwamawaka alishumi.

11.verse: Intloko yayo iyigolide engcwengiweyo, ecikizekileyo;  Isihlwitha sayo siziinduli ngeenduli, simnyama njengehlungulu.

12.verse: Amehlo ayo anjengawamavukuthu, engasemifuleni yamanzi,  Ezihlamba ngamasi, ehleli njengamatye afakwe kakuhle.

13.verse: Izidlele zayo zinjengemityino yetyeleba, njengeziganga zezityalo zokuqhola; Umlomo wayo unjengeenyibiba, uvuza imore ezivuzelayo.

14.verse: Izandla zayo ziintonga zegolide, zifakwe amatye aseTarshishe, Isibili sayo siluphondo lwendlovu, lukrwilwe ngesafire.

15.verse: Imilenze yayo ziintsika zemarmore emhlophe, zifakwe ezisekweni zegolide engcwengiweyo. Isithomo sayo sinjengeLebhanon, sisihle njengemisedare.

16.verse: Ikhuhlangubo layo linobumnandi; inqwenelekile yona iphela.  Yiyo leyo intanda yam; nguye lowo uwethu, Zintombi zaseYerusalem.

1.verse: Iye phi na intanda yakho, Wena nzwakazindini phakathi kweentokazi? Ibheke ngaphi na intanda yakho, Ukuze sikufunise?

2.verse: Intanda yam ihle yaya emyezweni wayo, emityinweni yetyeleba,  Ukuba yalusele emyezweni, ukuba ikhe iinyibiba.

3.verse: Mna ndingowentanda yam, nentanda yam yeyam yona; Yalusela ezinyibibeni.

4.verse: Uyinzwakazi, wethu, njengeTirtsa, Unomkhitha njengeYerusalem; Woyikeka njengemikhosi eneebhanile.

5.verse: Wasuse amehlo akho kum, Ngokuba andiqwelile. Iinwele zakho zinjengomhlambi weebhokhwe Ezisemathambekeni aseGiliyadi.

6.verse: Amazinyo akho anjengomhlambi weemazi zeegusha Ezinyukayo,  zivela ekuhlanjweni, Zonke zizele amawele, Kungekho ifelweyo kuzo.

7.verse: Zinjengothanda lwerharnate iintlafuno zakho, Ngaphaya kwesigqubuthelo sakho.

8.verse: Bangamashumi amathandathu ookumkanikazi, angamashumi asibhozo amashweshwe, Neentombi ezingenakubalwa.

9.verse: Mnye yena olivukuthu lam oyingqibeleli yam; Mnye yena kunina, Umnyulwa walowo wamzalayo. Zambona iintombi, zathi unoyolo, Bamdumisa ookumkanikazi namashweshwe.

10.verse: Ngubani na lo uthi gqi njengesifingo, Mhle njengenyanga,  Unyulu njengelanga, Woyikeka njengemikhosi eneebhanile?

11.verse: Bendihle ndaya emyezweni weminoti, Ukuba ndikhangele uhlaza lwesihlambo, Ndikhangele ukuba umdiliya unamathupha na,  Imirharnate ityatyambile na.

12.verse: Bendingazi ukuba umphefumlo wam undibeke Ezinqwelweni zabantu bam, zamanene.

13.verse: Buya, buya, mShulamikazi; Buya, buya, sikubone. Nibona ntoni na kumShulamikazi, Njengokungathi kukuqamba kwabaMahanayim?

1.verse: Azi kuhle ukunyathela kwakho ngeembadada, ntombi yenene!  Izimbo zamanqe akho zinjengezidanga, Umsebenzi wezandla zengcibi.

2.verse: Inkaba yakho sisidendeleko esiyinqila; Masingasweli iwayini ephithikeziweyo; Isisu sakho sisidimbilili sengqolowa,  Sibiyelwe ngeenyibiba.

3.verse: Amabele akho omabini anjengamankonyana ebhadi, Amankonyana amabini ebhadi, angamawele.

4.verse: Intamo yakho injengenqaba yophondo lwendlovu; Amehlo akho ngamachibi aseHeshbhon, Ngasesangweni layo, inabantu abaninzi;  Impumlo yakho injengenqaba yaseLebhanon Ebheke eDamasko.

5.verse: Intloko yakho phezu kwakho injengeKarmele, Ubuyakayaka bentloko yakho bunjengosinga olumfusa; Ukumkani ukhonkxwe ngeenjiko zabo.

6.verse: Azi umhle, azi umnandi, Luthando, eziyolweni!

7.verse: Iwonga lakho eli lifana nomthi wesundu; Amabele akho afana nezihloko zomdiliya.

8.verse: Ndathi, Ndiya kuminya emthini wesundu; Ndiya kubambelela emagqabini awo; Amabele akho makabe njengezihloko zomdiliya,  Nevumba lempumlo yakho libe njengeeapile;

9.verse: Nekhuhlangubo lakho libe njengewayini le ilungileyo, Ihla kamnandi kwintanda yam, Ibanga ukuba uthethe umlomo wabaleleyo.

10.verse: Mna ndingowentanda yam, Kukum ukungxamela kwayo.

11.verse: Hamba, ntanda yam, siphume siye emaphandleni, Silale emizaneni.

12.verse: Masivuke kusasa, siye ezidiliyeni, Sibone ukuba umdiliya unamathupha na, iintyantyambo zawo zibhenqekile na, Imirharnate ityatyambile na. Ndokunika apho izincokoliso zam.

13.verse: Amathuma apha anevumba; Phezu kweminyango yethu ziziqhamo ngeziqhamo ezimnandi kakhulu, ezitsha kwanezidala,  Endiziqwebele wena, ntanda yam.

1.verse: Akwaba ubunjengomnakwethu Obesanya amabele kama!  Bendingathi, ndikufumene phandle, ndikwange, Bangandideli noko.

2.verse: Bendiya kukuqhuba, bendiya kukusa endlwini kama; Ubuya kundifundisa. Bendiya kukuseza iwayini eqholiweyo, Nencindi yomrharnate wam.

3.verse: Isandla sayo sokhohlo besiya kuba phantsi kwentloko yam,  Esokunene sayo sindiwole.

4.verse: Zintombi zaseYerusalem, ndiyanifungisa, Ningathini na ukuluvusa, ningathini na ukuluvuselela uthando, Lude luthande?

5.verse: Ngubani na lo unyuka evela entlango, Esayama intanda yakhe?  Ngaphantsi komapile lo ndakuvusa wena. Khona apha waba nenimba ngawe unyoko, Khona apha waba nenimba owakuzalayo.

6.verse: Ndibeke njengomsesane wokutywina entliziyweni yakho,  njengomsesane wokutywina engalweni yakho. Ngokuba uthando lunjengokufa, ukuba nengcwangu, Ubukhwele bunjengelabafileyo,  ukuba lukhuni: Amalangatye abo ngamalangatye omlilo,  Ngamadangatye kaYehova.

7.verse: Amanzi amaninzi akanakulucima uthando; Imilambo ayinakuluntywilisela. Ingafanelana indoda irhole bonke ubuncwane bendlu yayo ngenxa yothando, Ingadelwa ideliwe.

8.verse: Sinomsakwethu omncinane, Akakabi namabele. Siya kuthini na ngomsakwethu, Mini aganelweyo?

9.verse: Ukuba uludonga yena, Siya kwakha phezu kwalo uqoqo lwesilivere; Ukuba ungumnyango, Somrhaqa ngamaceba omsedare.

10.verse: Ndaba ludonga mna, namabele am anjengenqaba; Ndaza emehlweni ayo ndaba njengo fumene uxolo.

11.verse: USolomon ubenesidiliya eBhahali-amon, Isidiliya wasinikela kubagcini, Ukuze elowo azise iwaka lesilivere ngesiqhamo saso.

12.verse: Isidiliya sam, esisesam, sona siselulawulweni lwam; Iwaka elo lelakho, Solomon; Amakhulu amabini ngawabagcini besiqhamo saso.

13.verse: Wena uhleliyo emiyezweni, Amakholwane alibazela indlebe izwi lakho, Ndivise.

14.verse: Dloba, ntanda yam, Uxelise ibhadi namankonyana amaxhama Ezintabeni zobulawu.
